job.name: Flux
job.command: cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} # setenv NODEBUG yes # setenv STARFPE NO # starver .DEV2 echo $INPUTFILE0 | grep ':' if (! $?) then set rung = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $1}'` set N = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $2}'` set name = `echo $INPUTFILE0 | awk -F\: '{print $3}'` else exit 1; endif set base = ${name}_${rung}; set file = ${base}.MuDst.root set logFile = ${base}.log echo "${file}" if ( ! -r ${file}) then root4star -q -b -x 'MakeV0.C('$N',"'${name}'",'${rung}')' >& ${logFile} endif
